description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts that relate to the taxonomy language found in either the HITRUST Threat Catalogue or the ENISA Threat Taxonomy.
name: OSRS Operational Framewrok - Human Threat
source: HITRUST Threat Catalogue and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Deliberate actions aimed to cause disruption or damage to information and/or IT assets for financial or personal gain.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Human Threat: HITRUST LIC1 Sabotage

values.description: Threat of unintentional but damaging distribution of information due to human error.  May include accidental leaks by employees, leaks via mobile applications, leaks via web applications, or leaks of information transfered over network mediums.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Human Threat: ENISA Information Leakage OR Sharing Due to Human Error
